namespace JSONApi;


class ResourceLinkage extends json_ready
{
    protected $id;
    protected $type;
    protected $arr;
    protected $resType

    /**
     * @param $data
     * @return ResourceLinkage
     */
    static function factory($data)
    {
        return new self($data);
    }

    /**
     * ResourceLinkage constructor.
     * @param $data
     */
    function __construct ($data)
    {
        echo "---------------\n";
        print_r($data);
        echo "---------------\n";
        if(is_array($data)) {
            foreach ($data as $item) {
                $obj = new \stdClass();
                $obj->id = $item->getId();
                $obj->type = $item->getType();
                $this->arr[] = $obj;
            }
        }

        if(is_object($data)) {
            $this->id = $data->getId();
            $this->type = $data->getType();
        }

    }

    function json_data ()
    {
        return parent::json_data();
    }

    function json_data_aaa ($keepIndexes = [])
    {
        $ret = new \stdClass();

    }
}
